page.title: 14A SCHOOLCHILD IN ABERNYTE
page.content: Woke at 7.30 got dressed in school uniform of grey skirt, blue or white shirt, a blue, black and white tie, black shoes and white socks.Went down stairs to breakfast of boiled egg, tea and toast. Brushed hair, which comes down to shoulder blades, went outside to play at jumping over canes.Van came at 8.45, got to school at 8.55 my friends and I played Kick the Can Bell rang at 9.00 First dinner money & savings was collected. Did maths.10.40 playtime played at British Bulldogs 11.00 all did music.Dinner of Chicken supreme,rice &vegetables then yougurt. In afternoon did sewing and English. 3.15 caught bus home.Played outside. 4.30 in and made a sandwich watched T.V. After tea of chips and sausage roll off guitar lesson in Perth.Home at 8.30.Read a book,sleep 9.30.
